component.name: solr
component.title: Solr
component.description: Perform operations against Apache Lucene Solr.
component.label: monitoring,search

lazyStartProducer.label: producer
lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

autowiredEnabled.label: advanced
autowiredEnabled.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.

CamelSolrCollection.description: The collection to execute the request again.

url.description: Hostname and port for the Solr server(s). Multiple hosts can be specified, separated with a comma. See the solrClient parameter for more information on the SolrClient used to connect to Solr.

autoCommit.description: If true, each producer operation will be automatically followed by a commit

connectionTimeout.description: Sets the connection timeout on the SolrClient

httpClient.description: Sets the http client to be used by the solrClient. This is only applicable when solrClient is not set.

maxRetries.description: Maximum number of retries to attempt in the event of transient errors

requestHandler.description: Set the request handler to be used

solrClient.description: Uses the provided solr client to connect to solr. When this parameter is not specified, camel applies the following rules to determine the SolrClient: 1) when zkHost or zkChroot (=zookeeper root) parameter is set, then the CloudSolrClient is used. 2) when multiple hosts are specified in the uri (separated with a comma), then the CloudSolrClient (uri scheme is 'solrCloud') or the LBHttpSolrClient (uri scheme is not 'solrCloud') is used. 3) when the solr operation is INSERT_STREAMING, then the ConcurrentUpdateSolrClient is used. 4) otherwise, the HttpSolrClient is used. Note: A CloudSolrClient should point to zookeeper endpoint(s); other clients point to Solr endpoint(s). The SolrClient can also be set via the exchange header 'CamelSolrClient'.

soTimeout.description: Sets the socket timeout on the SolrClient

streamingQueueSize.description: Sets the queue size for the ConcurrentUpdateSolrClient

streamingThreadCount.description: Sets the number of threads for the ConcurrentUpdateSolrClient

collection.label: CloudSolrClient
collection.description: Set the default collection for SolrCloud

zkChroot.label: CloudSolrClient
zkChroot.description: Set the chroot of the zookeeper connection (include the leading slash; e.g. '/mychroot')

zkHost.label: CloudSolrClient
zkHost.description: Set the ZooKeeper host(s) urls which the CloudSolrClient uses, e.g. zkHost=localhost:2181,localhost:2182. Optionally add the chroot, e.g. zkHost=localhost:2181,localhost:2182/rootformysolr. In case the first part of the url path (='contextroot') is set to 'solr' (e.g. 'localhost:2181/solr' or 'localhost:2181/solr/..'), then that path is not considered as zookeeper chroot for backward compatibility reasons (this behaviour can be overridden via zkChroot parameter).

allowCompression.label: HttpSolrClient
allowCompression.description: Server side must support gzip or deflate for this to have any effect

followRedirects.label: HttpSolrClient
followRedirects.description: Indicates whether redirects are used to get to the Solr server

password.label: security
password.description: Sets password for basic auth plugin enabled servers

username.label: security
